issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Feature request
Customer wants to create a Javascript module and include all .js files in the build.

Customer is building a pure javascript module. He wants to include all his .js assets in the built .a library, however only one .js file can be currently included for each module.
fields.summary: [ios/android]Module Projects: include all js assets in the library

comments.body:
Martin,

right now only one .js file can be included for each module, so you won't be able to include all your .js assets.

However I'm moving this ticket to a feature request for engineering - keep a watch to it for any update.

Thanks that s exactly what i wanted. I know that developers are the first clients of Appcelerator. And for us developer, protecting our work is a great concern.

I will also create another ticket about a related problem: i think that when releasing an app on android, js files are include like so and can be read by anyone who unzip the package.

Thanks Federico
